Kewal Kiran Clothing Limited (KKCL), the retail giant which owns brands like Killer, Integriti, Lawmanpg3, Easies and Desi Belle, has signed up as the Indian cricket team’s Official Sponsor.

articles.author: ESPNcricinfo staff
articles.title: Shikha Pandey credits Belinda Clark for comeback: She made me feel worthy, special - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: "I feel so assured of myself right now knowing someone like Belinda Clark has my back"
articles.content: Shikha Pandey on one of the learnings from Clark: "She kind of made me realise that I had so much more to offer to the game and giving up was not an option."  •  Associated Press
